# Ignore files generated by Visual Studio
.vscode/
.vs/
*.suo
*.user
*.sln.docstates
*.sln.ide
*.suo
*.user
*.sln.docstates
*.sln.ide
*.userprefs

# Ignore NuGet packages
*.nuget.props
*.paket.props
*.paket.targets
*.lock
*/packages/*
!**/packages.config

# Ignore build output
bin/
obj/
*.dll
*.exe

# Ignore Node.js dependencies
node_modules/

# Ignore Angular build output
dist/

# Ignore IDE and editor specific files
*.idea/
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln
*.sw*
*.vspscc
*.pdb
*.user
*.iws
*.idb
*.json
*.log
*.zip
*.xml
*.DS_Store
*.bak

# Ignore macOS specific files
.DS_Store

# Ignore Windows thumbnail cache files
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Ignore files generated by test frameworks
TestResults/

# Ignore files generated by dotnet CLI
*.dotnet/

# Ignore ReSharper files
_ReSharper*/

# Ignore Rider files
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Ignore personal user settings for various IDEs/editors
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project
*.idea/
.vscode/

# Ignore logs and databases
*.log
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3
*.db

# Ignore npm debugging logs
npm-debug.log*

# Ignore yarn integrity file
.yarn-integrity

# Ignore OS generated files
.DS_Store
ehthumbs.db
Icon?
Thumbs.db

# Ignore VS Code specific files
.vscode/
